snippet: Many couples learn that finding a religious leader to officiate at a same-sex wedding is far easier than finding one for a religiously mixed ceremony.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column notes interfaith gay couples are finding that the same spiritual leaders who support the civil right to wed might object on theological grounds to religiously mixed ceremonies.
lead_paragraph: Many couples learn that finding a religious leader to officiate at a same-sex wedding is far easier than finding one for a religiously mixed ceremony.

headline.print_headline: For Interfaith Gay Couples, Just One Obstacle Is Cleared
headline.main: For Interfaith Gay Couples, Just One Obstacle Is Cleared

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
